title: Offering prayers after Witr - Assim al hakeem
transcript: let's assume that you went to bed so you concluded your night prayer with Witter and then woke up in the middle of the night what to do you can pray as many Ras of tud as you wish but you cannot repeat the Witter again because the prophet Alat said that there are no two Witter in the same night so as long as you prayed your Witter at 10:00 and went to bed walk up at 4: you can pray 2 2 two as many as you wish but without repeating your uh witer Muhammad from Nigeria
